item.title: Ronda add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Ronda add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Ronda add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Ronda add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "For three things I thank God every day of my life: thanks that he has vouchsafed me knowledge of his works; deep thanks that he has set in my darkness the lamp of faith; deep, deepest thanks that I have another life to look forward to--a life joyous with light and flowers and heavenly song." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Ronda add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I can't imagine a man really enjoying a book and reading it only once." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Ronda add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "I always prefer to believe the best of everybody; it saves so much trouble" -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Ronda add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson
